about_the_game:
WAR. IT'S FANTASTIC!

Inspired by real life events, GRENADE DRONE SIMULATOR puts you in control of the wackiest form of post-modern, asymmetric warfare around! Precision strikes, coordinated tactics, and grave moral quandaries are for the other guys... you know the best way to defend your community is dropping adult magazines in a playground to lure in the godless invaders and lobbing a grenade from the safety of your couch!


  • Realistic Drone Warfare!
  • Shockingly Accurate Point System!
  • Absolutely No Murder Zombots!
  • Top of the Line Graphics for 2003!
  • Sort of Fun!
  • I Can't Stress This Enough....NO MURDER ZOMBOTS!
